article_title: Goldman Sachs-Backed Firm Partners To Move MRIs Into The Cloud

article_metadata.description: Once-rival radiology services firms Imaging Advantage and RadNet (RDNT) are partnering to bring lower imaging costs to the healthcare system as fee-for-service medicine that has rewarded unnecessary test-ordering moves to a value-based care model. Imaging Advantage, which is backed by Goldman Sachs (GS), and RadNet say they have signed a deal [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
